definition: committing all manner of crimes/completely unscrupulous

definition: not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
(negative prefix)/not/no
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
extremely/pole (geography, physics)/utmost/top

sentences.english: In order to achieve destructive purposes, al-Qaeda will do anything to.
sentences.chinese: 为了达成破坏性目的，基地组织将无所不用其极。

sentences.english: It did its utmost to provoke Mr Saakashvili into a fight.
sentences.chinese: 为了促使萨卡什维利先生卷入战争，俄无所不用其极。

sentences.english: Gentleman not machine, resort to extreme measures.
sentences.chinese: 君子不器，无所不用其极。
